explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a financial crisis prediction model based on machine learning techniques, specifically k-means++ and RBF neural networks.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The k-means++ algorithm is an unsupervised learning method used for clustering financial data.
explanations.classification: The improved RBF neural network is used for classifying companies into different financial risk categories.
explanations.clustering: The k-means++ algorithm is employed to cluster financial data, which is a key step in the proposed model.
explanations.neural network: The paper utilizes an improved radial basis function neural network (RBF NN) for financial risk prediction.
explanations.radial basis function: The RBF neural network is a core component of the proposed financial prediction model.
explanations.RBF: Abbreviation for radial basis function, which is central to the neural network model used in the study.
